column1: You’re invited to join us on our INCAS “ Hamburg Weekend ” from 7th to 9th October .
Hamburg is the second biggest city Germany and is located the north of the country at the North Sea . The canals
column3: and lakes and around Hamburg create unique environment .

column1: The city stands out through its cultural and historical variety . Take the opportunity to visit one of the largest ports Europe
column2: Hamburg ’s famous nightlife district Reeperbahn or the UNESCO World Heritage Site at the harbour

we take our private double-decker bus to Hamburg . On arrival we check into the Meininger Hostel and move into our rooms . Afterwards we have two-hour guided city tour on the bus to experience Hamburg at one go . On the next day we take two hour boat trip during which we see the hidden sights and the most beautiful spots the inner city from the water . In the afternoon you have the possibility either to explore Hamburg on your own or to take part our optional program .

column1: Before we return back to Aachen we have another guided city tour the ancient city of Lüneburg
column2: which could be preserved from the damages during World War II and is famous for its surrounding natural landscape

column1: For all participants breakfast and group bus/metro/discount pass for Hamburg is included .
In addition to our fixed program you have the possibility to participate our optional program
column3: Miniaturwunderland and the Container Port tour .

column1: We're looking forward to meeting you !
More information about the trip and the registration can be found on our homepage : http://www.incas.rwth-aachen.de/newsite/index.php/de/angebote/45-iwe-de/444-07-okt-iwe-hamburg
Participation Fee per Person : Starting from 117 € for 6-bedroom

column4: 2 August or further dates until all seats are taken ( there are 80 )

September 2014
The Rock Dance known as "" Rocking "" or the "" Uprock "" has been the center of controversy the B-Boy Community for the past 15 years !
The war-like dance started NYC during the late 60s and the precursor to Breakdancing and paralleled the Disco Era .
Due to the exclusiveness of The Brooklynights and New York Natives
column2: Rocking has been secretive form of dance ... Until NOW !

column1: Rob Nasty is Champion Uprocker and established B-Boy from the San Francisco Bay Area for the past 20 years .
He has made personal pilgrimages to Brooklyn NYC and learned from the best of the best at this style of dance .
A seasoned veteran all forms of "" Rocking ""
Rob Nasty is leading the next generation of dancers into the "" New Rock Era ""
column2: and is dedicated to spreading "" Rock Dance Culture "" around the world !

column1: Winner of 2004 True to the Game : Uprock Comp - Sacramento
Winner of 2007 B-Boy Hodown : Uprock Comp - Houston
Winner of 2008 Raiders of the Lost Art : Uprock Comp - Brooklyn
Winner of 2008 Dynasty Rockers 35th Anniversary : Uprock Comp - Las Vegas
Basic to advanced styles of Rocking ( Up-Rock and Top-Rock )
Understanding of up counts and down counts music
Transitions between steps and transitions to the floor
Integrating Rock Styles with Breaking and B-Boying . the all one package for rocking"

column1: Mit C2J lässt Trummer Abenteuerlust Improvisationsfreude freien Lauf . Ihre originellen Arrangements vielschichtigen musikalischen Texturen erfordern Virtuosität starke improvisatorische Fähigkeiten – willkommene Herausforderung Duo Trummer & Treboux !

In Jean-Lou Treboux Olivia Trummer Vollblut-Jazzmusiker seelenverwandten Mitmusiker gefunden . Treboux setzt instrumentale Virtuosität höchst geschmackvoll überrascht inspiriert instinktiven kreativen Herangehensweise Trummers Arrangements . Die lebendige Interaktion Duos erweckt Musik schließlich Leben .
Mit vielfältigen musikalischen Perspektiven beweist Projekt C2J eins : Dass Komplexität Schönheit Musik perfekte Kombination !

It 's the 20th band anniversary and the time is right to bring ROUGH SILK back to life – how can you do this better but with new album !
Mastermind Ferdy Doernberg ( known as band member of AXEL RUDI PELL as well ) teamed up with André Hort ( bass )
column2: Mike Mandel ( guitars ) and Alex Wenn ( drums )
column3: who are young and hungry musicians from the Hanover-area to bring fresh blood and enthusiasm into the band and most important to bring back more Metal into ROUGH SILK 's sound again ! So with the anniversary the new album start new era for the band and you can .. t name it better then with the album title : A New Beginning !

column1: ROUGH SILK were founded 1989 and have released seven studio and one best of album far their history . During all these years the band has defined their very unique sound which is best described by the band name ROUGH SILK : "" Rough "" stands for the real heavy ( sometimes even Thrash- and Death- ) Metal influences and "" Silk "" for the unusual singer-songwriter elements and piano-parts
column2: combining both to their very own brand of heavy but yet Melodic Metal .

column1: ROUGH SILK build up good reputation as live-act by suporting bands like HELLOWEEN
column11: SAXON and VICIOUS RUMORS among others .

column1: The founding members were Ferdy Doernberg ( keyboards
column8: vocals ) but there have been some changes that created kind of different eras of the band ’s history .

column1: The first era contained the albums “ Rough Silk ” ( Vinyl LP only )
column4: “ Circle Of Pain ” and “ Mephisto ” followed by first European tour with Savatage .

column1: The second era started with the 5th album when Barnett left the band and replaced by Thomas Ludolphy . In this periode the band recorded the albums “ Beyond The Sundown ” and “ Symphony of Life ” and supported Savatage Europe once more
column2: on Savatage ’s special wish . During this time ROUGH SILK brought out their first best Of album “ Wheels of Time ” .

column1: In 2002 Ludolphy left the band due to personal reasons and the band decided that they would not look for new singer . On the band .. s 7th studio album "" End of Infinity ""
column3: Hartmann and Wunderlich shared the lead-vocals . But unfortunatly it became obvious that the band members had parted minds and had no common vision on this style anymore
column4: this finally led to the end of the era and Rough Silk put on ice .

column1: Doernberg stayed busy playing the studio and on stage with acts like ULI JON ROTH ( ex- SCORPIONS )
column18: BRAINSTORM and many more as well as he toured and recorded again with AXEL RUDI PELL . Even though he performed his own music doing many solo-shows something missing . So he started looking for young and hungry musicians to form new Metal band .

column1: And as you already read he found the fitting band members and due to the 20th band anniversary now the 3rd era starts – with “ A New Beginning ” ! Be sure it sound heavier than ever !

column1: CHB presented its Conduction series 2016 . As part of the program
column2: CHB presents the next concert event on 12 October
column3: which reflects on Béla Bartók´s work . The evening concert is separated again into two different parts : it kicks off with the classical section with original compositions interpreted by the Classicus Quartet
column4: followed by improvisational contemporary concert of the CHB Orchestra which this time be led by Samu Gryllus . The evening commemorates for the 135th anniversary of Béla Bartók ’s birthdate .

column1: Classicus Quartet ( József Rácz and Réka Baksai on violins
column2: Péter Tornyai on viola and Tamás Zétényi playing cello ) is string quartet dedicated to the string quartet repertoire from Bartók . The quartet ’s recent performances include the premier of László Dobszay ’s string quartet
column3: concert at the Bartók Festival Ankara
column4: concert at the Esterházy Palace Fertőd

column3: has already met twice huge success with the conduction of Jean-Paul Bourelly and Renée Baker . This time
column4: on 12 October the orchestra is going to reflect to the infamous music of Bartók
column5: while Samu Gryllus conducts them with the alloy of Soundpainting .

column1: The CHB Orchestra consists of five nations’ outstanding musicians
column2: for this night together with the members of the Classicus Quartet :

column1: Conduction ( full name : conducted improvisation ) developed by Lawrence D. „ Butch “ Morris ( 1947 - 2013 )
column4: composer and conductor . Conduction is type of free improvisation where the conductor directs improvising ensemble with series of hand and baton gestures .

column1: Soundpainting is similar „ sign language ” for musicians through which the condutor connects the musicians’ improvisational melodies with the aim of creating one joint composition . Soundpainting developed by Walter Thompson 1974
column2: New York . It keeps the improvisational music strictly structured with the help of hundreds of hand and baton gestures . One of the most important contemporary
column3: Hungarian representative of the Soundpainting method is Samu Gryllus
column4: who is going to conduct the ensemble this evening with mixture Conduction and Soundpainting sings
column5: taking unique middle course between the two rival methods .

column1: Sound Modus represents one of the most diverse accustic performances of CHB ’s modus programs : it offers place for both classical and contemporary music
